identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer
identity.mission: Create a 'happening, lively, and interactive' AI Resume Tailor that breaks the boring SaaS mold.
identity.archetype: Electric & Neon (Archetype 2) - Adapted for High Energy

colors.mode_strategy: Hybrid (Dark Mode Default for 'Cool' factor, Light Mode for 'Clean' factor)

glassmorphism.usage: Sticky Headers, Floating Navs, Dashboard Cards

tracing_beam.description: Animated gradient border that traces the container edge.

gradients.rule: Use noise/grain overlay on gradients to avoid 'digital flatness'.

marketing_page.rules: Asymmetry is key. Use col-span-7 vs col-span-5. Never 50/50.

dashboard.grid_type: Mode B: The Control Room Grid
dashboard.rules: Dense, information-rich. Use bento-box style sizing.

spacing.scale: Generous. Use p-8, p-12, p-24 for sections.

buttons.style: Pill-shaped or Sharp Rectangles (mix based on context).
buttons.interaction: Scale down slightly on click (0.95). Glow on hover.

cards.style: Glassmorphism or Solid with Tracing Beam.

inputs.style: Minimalist. Bottom border only OR filled background with no border.

motion.micro_interactions: All interactive elements must have hover/tap states.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Electric & Neon' theme using the provided HSL values in tailwind.config.js.
Use 'Outfit' for all headings and 'Manrope' for body text.
Apply 'glassmorphism' classes to dashboard cards and sticky headers.
Use the provided image URLs for the respective sections.
Ensure all interactive elements have hover states and micro-animations.
Use framer-motion for page transitions and element entry animations.
Follow the 'Tetris Grid' for the landing page layout.
Do NOT use generic gradients. Use the 'Neon Future' palette.
Ensure high contrast for accessibility (WCAG AA).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Avoid 'AI slop' aesthetic (generic centered layouts, uniform styling).
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
Do NOT apply universal transition (e.g., transition: all).
Do NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles (pill-shaped or sharp).
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
